article.class: post-15018 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-ff category-hs category-ms category-news category-se category-te entry

h2.a: Local communications company and VSCSD partner to solve internet access for students

div.p: Thanks to EcoVision, Inc., the authorized U.S. Cellular dealer in Vinton, and the Vinton Shellsburg School District, 40 Vinton-Shellsburg families who didn’t have internet access from home will soon have service. Kelley Lokenvitz, the business development manager for EcoVision’s four Iowa locations, facilitated the assistance for VSCSD students. “We know many families don’t have internet… Continue Reading the article: Local communications company and VSCSD partner to solve internet access for students

footer.p: Article by VSCSD / District, Friday Folders, High School, Middle School, News, Shellsburg, Tilford

article.class: post-14916 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-ff category-hs category-ms category-news category-se category-te entry

h2.a: Board of Directors meet in Special Session

div.p: The Vinton-Shellsburg Community School District school board met in special session on Tuesday, March 24, 2020. All board members answered roll call; Superintendent Hainstock and Business Manager Barkdoll were present. There were no audience comments. Under Superintendent’s Report, Hainstock updated the board on the meal program and other district work since the closure on March… Continue Reading the article: Board of Directors meet in Special Session

footer.p: Article by VSCSD / District, Friday Folders, High School, Middle School, News, Shellsburg, Tilford

article.class: post-14994 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-ff category-hs category-ms category-news category-se category-te entry

div.p: It has been an interesting week for all of us. We don’t have exact numbers but estimate about 80-90% of our students or their parents came to clean out lockers and take home items on Wednesday and Thursday. We appreciated that people came in, got what they needed to, and then left in a timely… Continue Reading the article: Update: March 19, 2020, 4 pm

article.class: post-14860 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-news entry

div.p: (3/19/20, 3 pm) As we are gathering more information about the length of time things are going to be closed, I wanted to provide the most detailed update I could, in hopes to answer as many questions as possible. Week of March 16th: No Gym Day and No Kenzie Field TripWeek of March 23rd: No Gym DayWeek of… Continue Reading the article: Home School FAQ

div.div: Copyright © 2020 · Vinton Shellsburg Community School District · Login · Powered by ITSVinton-Shellsburg Community School District Equity Statement: The Vinton-Shellsburg Community School District provides equal educational and employment opportunities and will not illegally discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, disability, religion, creed, age, marital status, sexual orientation, or gender identity. Vinton-Shellsburg Community School District shall take affirmative action in recruitment, appointment, assignment, and advancement of women and men, minorities and disabled. Inquiries regarding compliance with equal educational or employment opportunities and/or affirmative action shall be directed to Becky Lutgen, Equity Coordinator, Vinton-Shellsburg CSD, 1502 C Avenue, Vinton, Iowa 52349. Inquiries may also be addressed in writing to the Director of the Region VII Office of the United States Equal Employment Opportunities Commission, or the Director of the Region VII Office of Civil Rights, United States Department of Education in Chicago, IL
